title: Preseason ranked vs normals?
body:
What is the point of playing ranked in preseason versus normals?

I understand playing ranked during preseason still passively increases your mmr but like.... Won't you be playing at a huge disadvantage because not everyone has learned the changes yet? Wouldn't playing normals, adjusting, then playing ranked later be better?

Seeing as how even ranked mmr isn't a good indicator of skill under diamond i don't see any advantages
